data.name: ●LIVE IN DUNGEON
data.detailed_description:
Wonderlucia, an alternate world where streaming is the sole form of advanced technology.
Become a novice live streaming adventurer and explore dungeons with your cat buddy and quirky viewers!

How to become a streamer-adventurer

You can choose how to reply to your viewers’ comments. The better your reply, the more “likes” you get.
You can also use likes to improve your skills, weapons, and armor.

Narrative-active command battle

Exploring dungeons means battling enemies. During battles, you will be fighting opponents through an active command battle system. Minimize wait time between attacks by making great replies to comments. Your skill as a live streamer affects the outcome of a battle!
Comments come hard and fast when you’re in the middle of an exciting boss battle! Rely on your supportive viewers and face off against powerful enemies.

Explore beautiful dungeons

From the natural beauty of a forest to ancient ruins full of bizarre artifacts, you’ll be exploring unique dungeons from a first-person perspective.
You’ll occasionally find unexplored regions with stunning photogenic spots which are sure to get a ton of likes from your viewers!

data.short_description: ●LIVE IN DUNGEON is an RPG where you play as an adventurer live-streaming from another world. Explore dungeons with your cat buddy and collect “likes” for live-streaming your adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
